name: Deadhunt
description: Deadhunt is a first person arcade shooter game that merges the best features of arcade and FPS action games. Stay as long as possible on fighting pits against hordes of zombies and skeletons.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz processor or better Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX-compatible video card with 32MB video memory Storage: 60 MB available space
